title: Little Man
writer: Keenen Ivory Wayans, Shawn Wayans, Marlon Wayans
short_cast: Marlon Wayans, Shawn Wayans, Kerry Washington, John Witherspoon, Tracy Morgan, Lochlyn Munro, Chazz Palminteri, Molly Shannon, David Alan Grier, Dave Sheridan
cast: Marlon Wayans, Shawn Wayans, Kerry Washington, John Witherspoon, Tracy Morgan, Lochlyn Munro, Chazz Palminteri, Molly Shannon, David Alan Grier, Dave Sheridan
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: A man is so eager to become a dad that he'll believe anything, including the notion that a baby-faced thief on the lam is really an abandoned toddler.
